list.name: Default
list.comment: Improved recovery from MediaPlayer's error state (tested OK)

task.summary: Default task
Fixed app permission requests for Android < 6
Version 3.3
Updated to gradle 4.0.0
Refactored SongListActivity to use Kotlin, ViewModel, and to fetch the song cursor in a coroutine.
Added splash background icon
Fixed icons not updating in notification after lib update
Converted MusicNotification to Kotlin
SongListActivity now requests permissions if necessary
MusicService now requests permissions if necessary
Version 3.4 (7)
Automatic pause when receiving a phone call, and resume when it ends
Adding animations to widget, using a ViewFlipper.
Improved ViewFlipper animations in widget
Experiment with autoSizeTextType - didn't work
Reduced animation duration
Added missing READ_PHONE_STATE permission for old Android versions
The media player can now be controlled with headset media buttons
Refactored code to use Koin for dependency injection
Added FAB button to SongListActivity. Improved toolbar.
Added ads to SongListActivity. Multidex support.
Added toolbar divider
Version 8 - 4.0
WIP to show album art in SongListActivity
Added album art to notifications
WIP to show album art in SongListActivity | weird error
Added album art to notifications
Open SongListActivity when clicking on the notification
Added album art to widget
Added metadata info (duration and state) to notifications in Android 10
Dynamic album art size in widget
Added album art to SongListActivity
Performance improvement for AlbumArtLoader (added cache)
Added default album art icon for notification and song list
Converting classes to Kotlin
Added Glide to proguard rules
Converted remaining classes to Kotlin
Code improvements
Improved performance when loading album art in SongListActivity
Alternative way to load album art, compatible with Android Q
Updated libs, removed Glide warnings from log
Attempt to fix RemoteServiceException: Context.startForegroundService() did not then call Service.startForeground() Code cleanup
Fixed crash when pressing play on the headset, when the player was stopped.
Version 9 - 5.0
Fixed out of memory error during bundle generation
Fixed empty notification when there are no songs to play
Fixed IllegalStateException in MediaBrowserService.performLoadChildren Version 5.0.1
Override size on album art load with Glide
Start SongListActivity scrolling to the current song position. Attempt to recover from MediaPlayer's error state.
Improved recovery from MediaPlayer's error state (tested OK)
